name: Tomb Guard VR
description: Minds-on and hands-on. Customize the layout of various traps to build defense system. Protecting the tomb civilization from being plundered, you will battle with the Tomb Raiders by using BOW,SWORD and SHIELD, etc.. Archery and attack are very important, while the the layout of TRAPS is the key to victory!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 - 4590 equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD R9 290 or NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive VR headset and controller.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i7-6800 equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Fury or NVIDIA GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive VR headset and controller.
